blogPost.excerpt: Scale database resources in and out on demand to match application requirements and traffic so that you pay only for what you use. Runs on every cloud with developer GraphQL, REST, JSON, CQL APIs. $25 usage credits per month.
blogPost.body: Scale database resources in and out on demand to match application requirements and traffic so that you pay only for what you use. Runs on every cloud with developer GraphQL, REST, JSON, CQL APIs. $25 usage credits per month.
blogPost.title: Astra Serverless Database - An on-demand database for supercharging your next project
blogPost.author: Jake Luciani

localize.description: 按需扩展数据库资源，以满足应用需求和流量，因此您只需为您使用的资源付费。在每个云上运行，并提供开发者GraphQL、REST、JSON、CQL API。每月25美元的使用额度。
